intro.p: This node discards all the labels on molecule's atoms and replaces them with the given label. It also discards all stereochemistry from molecules.
This node uses Indigo classes to process and display structures.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains the molecules.
Appends a new molecule column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.
The new atom label which will be put on all molecule's atoms (default is "*")

ports.outPort: The same as input, with replaced atom labels
